tool_description: Configures Kubernetes clusters or Docker Swarm orchestration with deployment manifests, services, and scaling policies.

node_count.description: Number of worker nodes in the cluster

master_instance_type.description: Instance type for master/control plane nodes

container_images.description: List of container images to deploy

ingress_enabled.description: Enable ingress controller for external access

monitoring_enabled.description: Enable cluster monitoring and metrics collection

service_mesh.description: Service mesh to install: istio, linkerd, consul-connect

network_policy.description: Network policy provider: calico, cilium, weave

error_messages: Invalid orchestrator type: Use one of [kubernetes, docker-swarm].
Node count out of range: Must be between 1 and 100 nodes.
Invalid instance type: Check cloud provider documentation for valid instance types.
Container image not found: Verify all images in container_images list exist and are accessible.
Cluster creation failed: Check resource limits and network configuration.
Invalid service mesh: Use one of [istio, linkerd, consul-connect] or None.
Invalid network policy provider: Use one of [calico, cilium, weave].
usage: Specify orchestrator type, cluster configuration, and deployment images. The tool creates the cluster and deploys specified containers with optional features.

cluster_id.description: Unique identifier for the created cluster

cluster_endpoint.description: API endpoint URL for cluster management

kubeconfig.description: Configuration file content for cluster access
